cmpTitle: Help Himmatbhai In His Mission To Educate Hundreds Of Underprivileged Women & Children

timeline.desc: Amount successfully received by CharityZ. Thanks for the donation!
Amount deposited into Pochabai Foundation account.
Update from beneficiary : Your Amount has been used to purchase text books for 12 girl students of 8th grade.
Update from beneficiary : Your Amount has been used to purchase a black board for Government Secondary School, Khambhat, Anand, Gujarat.
